author: eptwts
text:
people will tell you they're "trying" to get into online biz...

but are they scouting the internet for potential products?

are they researching reddit, X & tiktok for the biggest pain points a market is facing?

do they have a funnel + other sales assets set up & ready to go?

are they spamming content on YT, X & short-form platforms to send people down this funnel?

99% of the people who say they're "trying" are lying to you & even worse, they're lying to themselves

the 4 things i just listed are the BARE MINIMUM to be able to say that you're trying
